mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.name FROM (SELECT id, userid, date, '篮球场' type, start_time, end_time, ispay, site_no, iscomplete FROM tb_basketball UNION SELECT id, userid, date, '羽毛球场' type, start_time, end_time, ispay, site_no, iscomplete FROM tb_badminton UNION SELECT id, userid, date, '乒乓球台' type, start_time, end_time, ispay, 0 site_no, iscomplete FROM tb_pingpang) a, (SELECT id, name FROM tb_user) b WHERE a.userid = b.id ORDER BY a.date DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{page_size}
